-  parameterMode 

Instance Property# parameterMode

iOS 16.0+iPadOS 16.0+Mac CatalystmacOS 13.0+tvOS 16.0+visionOSwatchOS 9.0+

```
final var parameterMode: IntentPerson.ParameterMode? { get }
```

Available when `Value` conforms to `_IntentValue`, `Value` conforms to `Sendable`, and `Value.ValueType` is `IntentPerson`.## [See Also](/documentation/AppIntents/IntentParameter/parameterMode#see-also)

### [Accessing the parameter mode](/documentation/AppIntents/IntentParameter/parameterMode#Accessing-the-parameter-mode)

[`enum ParameterMode`](/documentation/appintents/intentperson/parametermode)The type of interface to show when someone chooses a parameter that contains information about a person.
